Texts.Chs: 宇宙中所有的物质都是由被称为量子的微粒组成的。这种能量以特定的频率脉动或共振进入组成原子的过程中。因此，每个原子都有不同的脉冲或频率。
Texts.Eng: All matter in the universe is composed of small packets of energy known as quantas. This energy, which goes into the making up of atoms pulsates or resonates at a particular frequency. Each atom being different therefore, has a slightly different pulsation or frequency.

Texts.Chs: 整个马铃薯及其各个部分之间存在着一种“电磁感应”。如果你把土豆切成两半，每一半的频率是完全相同的。这个频率在宇宙中是唯一的。
Texts.Eng: There exists an 'empathy' between the whole potato and each of its individual parts. If you slice that potato in half, the frequency of each half is exactly the same. The only example of that frequency anywhere in the universe.

Texts.Chs: 因此，每一种由原子组成的物质，被称为分子，都有自己独特的频率，不同于其他任何物质。因为每个单独的东西都是独一无二的，举个例子，没有一个土豆和其他的土豆完全一样。
Texts.Eng: Thus each material thing being made up of a combination of atoms, called molecules, has its own unique frequency, unlike any other. Now because each individual thing is unique, no potato for instance is exactly like any other potato.
